Getting Started¶

Dependencies¶

  • numpy

  • scipy

  • pybullet

  • pyquaternion

Optionally, if users would like to take advantage of rbw.utils.render blender must be available via system path.

Installation¶

pip install /https://github.com/CNCLgithub/rigid_body_world/archive/master.zip

rbw
